page.title: 10A Day In My Life
page.content: At 7.15 a.m. I get up, get washed and then wake my Mum up. Then I put my uniform on, grey clothes and a tie with red and black stripes. After that I go downstairs and have my breakfast of Frosties. I have toast as well. After that I go to school with my friend Paul. School starts at five to nine. On Monday morning we do maths and at playtime I play "Tig-1,2,3". You start by seeing who is on, then the person who is on counts up to a hundred and whilst he is doing it the other people hide. Then he looks for them. After play we watch "Zig Zag" on television and then talk and write about it. After dinner we write a poem and go home at 3.30. Later I have my tea, then I go on my cycling proficiency course. When I get back I go to bed.
